title: [Large-Scale] Remote and Blended Collaborative Learning Design: Reuse Support Strategies Based on Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic cooperative learning principles, mathematics education, and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen mathematics pedagogy, focusing on group formation and collaborative structures in simulation/VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explicitly represent social structures (group number, size, composition) by analyzing existing collaborative learning designs.
Learners can reuse collaborative learning designs for new learning environments by utilizing SSRs (Social Structure Representations).
Learners can experiment with and evaluate effective collaboration structures during math problem-solving processes using VR simulation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
